remarks: Any subset of ` X ` containing a neighborhood of a set is a neighborhood of this set.  Proposition Vi of [BourbakiTop1] p.  I.3.  (Contributed by FL, 2-Oct-2006.)
statement:
neips.1 $e |- X = U. J $.
ssnei2 $p |- ( ( ( J e. Top /\ N e. ( ( nei ` J ) ` S ) ) /\ ( N C_ M /\ M C_ X ) ) -> M e. ( ( nei ` J ) ` S ) ) $.
